sentences.sContent: The giant cactus is the vegetable skycraper.
sentences.sContent_eng: The giant cactus is the vegetable skycraper.
sentences.sCn: 高大的仙人掌是植物界巨人。

sentences.sContent: A saguaro cactus stands tall amid a frenzy of lightning bolts in Arizona.
sentences.sContent_eng: A saguaro cactus stands tall amid a frenzy of lightning bolts in Arizona.
sentences.sCn: 亚利桑那州，一株巨人柱仙人掌矗立在一团狂暴的闪电中。

sentences.sContent: The cactus… well, that will have to languish in the bathroom until next Spring.
sentences.sContent_eng: The cactus… well, that will have to languish in the bathroom until next Spring.
sentences.sCn: 仙人掌……，在春天到来前都应该把它放在浴室里。

trans.tranOther: a desert plant with sharp points instead of leaves
